assignments.description: SessionId may be used by flows calling this as a subflow
assignments.name: SetSessionId
assignments.label: Set Session Id

decisions.description: Is the Program an AIHW Reporter?
decisions.name: AIHW_Reporter
decisions.label: AIHW Reporter?

decisions.name: CheckIfAddingParticipantToSession
decisions.label: Check If Adding Participant To Session

decisions.description: Is the previous months collection period missing?
decisions.name: CollectionPeriodMissing
decisions.label: Collection Period Missing

decisions.description: Checks if the case is closed
decisions.name: Is_Case_Closed
decisions.label: Is Case Closed?

formulas.name: CPCheck
formulas.expression: IF(MONTH(TODAY()) - MONTH({!GetCase.Latest_Collection_Period__c}) == -11, true, IF(MONTH(TODAY()) - MONTH({!GetCase.Latest_Collection_Period__c}) == 1, true, IF(MONTH(TODAY()) - MONTH({!GetCase.Latest_Collection_Period__c}) == 0, true,false)))

fields.name: AIHWReporterText
fields.fieldText:
This Program is an AIHW Reporter


The Unsuccessful Contact Attempt function is only available to this program once it is in Service Delivery (an Allocated Case).

fields.name: Select_Related_Cases_to_Duplicate_Session_CaseNote
fields.fieldText: Select Related Cases to Duplicate Session/CaseNote:

fields.name: NoneSelectedText
fields.fieldText: If none are available or you want to select none then press next to continue.

fields.name: ClosedText
fields.fieldText:
This Case is Closed.


A Session & Case Note cannot be recorded for a Case that has been previously closed and most likely already reported to our funders. Please create a new Case for the Participant and then record the Session/Case Note from there.

fields.name: ErrorText
fields.fieldText:
Sorry, something went wrong :(


Please review the below text, it may explain the problem in a way you can fix by pressing "Previous" and changing your entered data. Otherwise, please screenshot this error, and send it to IT Support.


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: MissingCPText
fields.fieldText:
This Case is missing a Collection Period.


A Session & Case Note cannot be recorded for this Case as it has been more than 2 Months since the last Collection Period.


This Cases Collection Periods have already been uploaded and so this case needs to be closed and a new case created for the new Collection Period.

value.stringValue: Add the Participant to the Session
Do Not add the Participant to the Session

fields.name: LocationText
fields.fieldText:
﻿Location


Select Social Futures Site / Office and then choose one of our office locations from the picklist, or select Offsite / Outreach before recording details of the offsite location in the box below

fields.name: SectionSeparator
fields.fieldText: Click Next to continue to the Next Page

fields.name: SelectSiteOrLocationText
fields.fieldText:
ERROR: Please select a Social Futures Site where the session was held.


Press "Previous" to review and amend.

variables.description: Used to pass this session's start date onto subsequent flows
variables.name: SessionDate

variables.description: If true, the automatic redirect to the session / question about completing a Case Note will be skipped. Usually set to True if being used as a subflow from another flow
variables.name: SkipFollowonActions
